snippet: With the American-led campaign against the Islamic State stalemated, Iraqi Shiites are applauding Russia’s display of military power in neighboring Syria and the leadership of President Vladimir V. Putin.
abstract: Shiites in Iraq are applauding Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin for military action Russia is taking in Syria against Islamic State militants; many Shiites view Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad's government as countervailing force to Sunni militants, and are supportive of Russian intervention.

byline.contributor: Omar Al-Jawoshy contributed reporting from Baghdad, and Andrew E. Kramer from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: With the American-led campaign against the Islamic State stalemated, Iraqi Shiites are applauding Russia’s display of military power in neighboring Syria and the leadership of President Vladimir V. Putin.

headline.main: Shiites in Iraq Hailing Putin for Syria Push
headline.print_headline: Shiites in Iraq Hailing Putin for Syria Push

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
